in loving memory of Sweet Jasmine, who was one of the rescued dogs from Michael Vick 's property. Jasmine is also featured on the cover of Jim Gorant's " The Lost Dogs ." Jasmine's House and its mission will strive to end the neglect, cruelty, and abuse inflicted on the American Pit Bull Terrier and to restore the excellent reputation once held by them during the 20th century, through education, rescue, rehabilitation, and adoption( credit: www.jasmineshouse.org).
